    Class
    Description
    JavaVirtualMachine
    An object for working with the Java virtual machine.
    JavaVirtualMachineHealth
    Information about the Java virtual machine that relates to health and resources
    ShutdownHook
    Adds ordered execution of shutdown hooks to the functionality provided by Runtime.addShutdownHook(Thread).
    ShutdownHook.Order
    The order that a hook should be run in, either among the set of first hooks, or among the set of last hooks.
    ThreadSnapshot
    Captures a snapshot of ThreadStatus for all running threads via the Java management API.
    ThreadStatus
    Information about the state of a thread from Java's management API.
